title: YouTuber Jaclyn Hill shows off stretch marks following weight comments
text:
Jaclyn has said she is ‘over’ comments regarding her weight (Picture: YouTube)

YouTuber Jaclyn Hill has shown off her stretch marks after receiving a flurry of online comments regarding her weight, as she admits that she cannot take them ‘seriously’.

The vlogger uploaded a new video to her YouTube channel on 13 October, where she informed her followers about her recent life updates, and admitted that she is ‘over’ the constant criticism over her weight.

‘You know, there is one more thing I wanna say…I’ve been getting so many comments, I’ve gotten these comments for a long time, I would say for the past two years, but the past couple of months they’re like flooding in,’ she told the camera, as she said she was used to getting comments from critics asking for the ‘old Jaclyn’ back.

‘I can’t even take the comments seriously! It’s hard for me to even address this because I just wanna laugh and cry about it at the same time,’ she continued.

‘There is no ‘old Jaclyn’ and there is no ‘new Jaclyn,’ this is who I am. I know that you guys want that thin girl who was super peppy and loved life and was silly and joking all the time, and just did tutorials because she just loved it so much.

‘But you guys, I am seriously that same girl inside. That’s still who I am and I need that to be said.’

She later proudly showed off her stretch marks on camera, revealing that she wants her fans to accept her for who she is.

‘Honestly I’m just over it. This is my body, this is where I’m at, you guys need to accept it,’ she added.

‘You guys need to accept that I’ve gained weight, and no I’m not pregnant, no I’m not trying to hide it from you.’

The 29-year-old also said that right now, she is committed to her passion, which is makeup.

‘That’s all I’ve ever wanted, just to do makeup, to teach makeup, to create makeup.

‘And I have failed at many of my attempts and it has been beyond humiliating, it’s been awful, you have no idea how hard it’s been for me personally. But that is my passion, that is my love.’
